bibl.title: Pindar in the Second and Third Hymns of Callimachus.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Michigan. Summary in DA 51 (1990-1991) p. 1219-A. - This dissertation is of interest to persons studying archaic Greek lyric, papyrology, and Hellenistic literature.
LORD Kristin Oressa, Pindar in the Second and Third Hymns of Callimachus.
